trans-unit.source: How to: Create an Object Pool by Using a ConcurrentBag
trans-unit.target: 如何：使用 ConcurrentBag 创建目标池

trans-unit.source: How to: Create an Object Pool by Using a ConcurrentBag
trans-unit.target: 如何：使用 ConcurrentBag 创建目标池

trans-unit.source: How to: Create an Object Pool by Using a ConcurrentBag
trans-unit.target: 如何：使用 ConcurrentBag 创建目标池

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use a concurrent bag to implement an object pool.
trans-unit.target: 本示例演示如何使用并发包来实现对象池。

trans-unit.source: Object pools can improve application performance in situations where you require multiple instances of a class and the class is expensive to create or destroy.
trans-unit.target: 在需要某个类的多个实例并且创建或销毁该类的成本很高的情况下，对象池可以改进应用程序性能。

trans-unit.source: When a client program requests a new object, the object pool first attempts to provide one that has already been created and returned to the pool.
trans-unit.target: 客户端程序请求新对象时，对象池先尝试提供一个已创建并返回到该池的对象。

trans-unit.source: If none is available, only then is a new object created.
trans-unit.target: 仅在没有可用对象时，才会创建一个新对象。

trans-unit.source: [ConcurrentBag<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag-1) is used to store the objects because it supports fast insertion and removal, especially when the same thread is both adding and removing items.
trans-unit.target: [ConcurrentBag<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag-1) 用于存储对象，因为它支持快速插入和移除，特别是在同一线程既添加又移除项时。

trans-unit.source: This example could be further augmented to be built around a [IProducerConsumerCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection-1), which the bag data structure implements, as do [ConcurrentQueue<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentQueue-1) and [ConcurrentStack<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentStack-1).
trans-unit.target: 可将此示例进一步扩充，以围绕包数据结构实现的 [IProducerConsumerCollection<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection-1) 来生成，与 [ConcurrentQueue<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentQueue-1) 和 [ConcurrentStack<T>](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentStack-1) 相似。
